# url

**Instance Property**

The URL of the webpage this item represents.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var url: URL { get }
```

## Getting the Page-Specific Information

- **title**: The title of the webpage this item represents.

items.description: The title of the webpage this item represents.
items.name: title

title: url
